hba1c.comment: Table to standardise hba1c unit conversions - this one standardises to mmol/mol (IFCC) and % (DCCT)

haemoglobin.comment: Table to standardise hb unit conversions - this one standardises to g/l and g/dl

random_blood_sugar.comment: Table to standardise random blood sugar units - this one does mmol/l and mg/dl
